mdRecord.dcterms:title: Busch Mausoleum, exterior
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Tomb of Adolphus Busch and Lilly Anheuser Busch. The structure, home to elaborate stained glass panels, resembles a small church. The inscription above the entrance reads: “Veni, Vidi, Vici” — or “I came, I saw, I conquered.” --http://www.bellefontainecemetery.org/grounds/architecture/ [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture and City Planning
tombs

Busch, Elizabeth Lilly Anheuser (German and American spouse, 1844-1928)
